tasks.task: Identify profitable crops for small-scale farmers.
subtasks: Calculate profit margins for various crops.
Assess beans as the first profitable crop.
Consider garden peas (Minji) as a profitable crop.
Evaluate coriander as the most profitable crop.
Analyze green maize as a profitable crop.
Highlight indigenous vegetables as a profitable option.
Understand the factors contributing to the profitability of each crop.

tasks.task: Provide guidance on calculating profit in agriculture.
subtasks: Explain the difference between revenue and profit.
Factor in production costs for accurate profit calculation.
Consider additional costs such as labor and resources.

tasks.task: Discuss the importance of market demand and consistency.
subtasks: Stress the value of consistent supply to local grocery stores.
